name: Plivo
semantic_context: Send SMS/MMS messages or make phone calls
natural_language_description: 这是 Plivo 节点。主要用于: Send SMS/MMS messages or make phone calls

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: sms | (必填项)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: make
available_options: Make (值: make) - Make a voice call

from.name: from
from.description: Caller ID for the call to make
from.natural_language_description: 参数名: From | 作用: Caller ID for the call to make | (必填项)

to.name: to
to.description: Phone number to make the call to
to.natural_language_description: 参数名: To | 作用: Phone number to make the call to | (必填项)

message.name: message
message.natural_language_description: 参数名: Message | 作用: Message to send

media_urls.name: media_urls
media_urls.description: Comma-separated list of media URLs of the files from your file server
media_urls.natural_language_description: 参数名: Media URLs | 作用: Comma-separated list of media URLs of the files from your file server

answer_method.name: answer_method
answer_method.description: HTTP verb to be used when invoking the Answer URL
answer_method.natural_language_description: 参数名: Answer Method | 作用: HTTP verb to be used when invoking the Answer URL | 默认值: POST | (必填项)

answer_url.name: answer_url
answer_url.description: URL to be invoked by Plivo once the call is answered. It should return the XML to handle the call once answered.
answer_url.natural_language_description: 参数名: Answer URL | 作用: URL to be invoked by Plivo once the call is answered. It should return the XML to handle the call once answered. | (必填项)
